reviewText: I have watched this whole set twice already and recently decided to watch again. I was missing two of the tapes and was so happy to find them here on Amazon. So sorry to hear Gary passed away this year (2016). His tapes are wonderful and very helpful.

A wonderful series I recommend it to any family or any one considering marriage, watch them several times until you can learn to apply the methods.  They are bible based.  Fix them a meal and put one of the video's on.
